text: I think your online ordering is quick & easy to use. The website is user friendly, helpful & finding your local deals is easy too! The customer service has always been awesome!

name: Rob Silva
text: We often visit Pizza Huts because we know what to expect and appreciate the good value. This location is no exception and has, in fact, exceeded our expectations. The service is always great, the food is always well prepared, and restrooms are always clean.

name: Dale Martell
text: Salad bar, a soda and a Personal Pan Pizza for $8.00? That's a great deal and it's fresh and tasty!

name: Cindy Ho
text: The employee that served my grandson and me absolutely by no question made our meal top of the line good! He also kept his pleasant attitude the entire time we were their. On the merits of service alone I would recommend this restuarant to anyone and everyone.

text: This place had great pizza and pasta. Surprisingly good! Whether it tasted so good because we were tired and super hungry, we will never know. Also, we ate it at the restaurant, so it never got a chance to cool down or get soggy.

text: Very good, ordered the pizzas to be timed perfectly as we drove through Missoula on our way to Idaho. Pizza was hot and made correctly. I would recommend this location for good pizza
